abstract: Openings of Birch Coffee and Filtered Coffee, two upscale coffee shops in South Bronx, is seen by some residents as harbinger of gentrification.
lead_paragraph: Will two new cafes serve as catalysts for the community or something bigger? Or both?

headline.main: South Bronx Gets High-End Coffee; Is Gentrification Next?
headline.print_headline: Fancy Coffee Has the South Bronx Talking

snippet: Will two new cafes serve as catalysts for the community or something bigger? Or both?
